TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: Little Ship, Big Adventure

Articles.Content: Cupcake Landers had one more mission on his wishlist: flying an SSTO to Duna and back without refueling. Unlike an earlier attempt during which Bob was left stranded in deep space this mission goes off without a hitch. Very impressive! Of course, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all in a dayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s work for Jebediah Kerman.

Great video, great builder, great post choice.

 Save the Gold tank!!

Well deserved Cupcake!
